briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, Dosimetry, and Preliminary Efficacy of the HER2 Directed Radioligand CAM-H2 in Patients With Advanced/Metastatic HER2-Positive Breast, Gastric, and Gastro-Esophageal Junction (GEJ) Cancer
officialTitle: A Multi-Center Open Label Dose Escalation and Dose Expansion Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerability, Dosimetry, and Preliminary Efficacy of the HER2 Directed Radioligand CAM-H2 in Patients With Advanced/Metastatic HER2-Positive Breast, Gastric, and GEJ Cancer
conditions: Advanced/Metastatic HER2-positive Breast, Gastric, Gastroesophageal Junction Cancer With Disease Progression Following Anti-HER2 Standard of Care Treatment
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Proportion of patients achieving an objective response (CR or PR) with the use of CAM-H2 as measured by the RECIST version 1.1
